Entries.Text: Unable to find their allies and in fear of being branded a deserter,
Unable to return home and being hunted by the law,
Unable to face thier master and where no were else to go,
Running for thier life and unsure who to turn to,
Our Hero find themselves wondering aimlessly,
when they meet a Mysterious Figure.
I've been looking for someone very special and I couldn't help but notice you wondering aimlessly.
Hmm
The Mysterious Figure leans in a bit too close, looking you up and down.
Capable
but inexperienced.
Ambitious
but directionless.
and
completely anonymous!
Yes! You're just the person I've been looking for.
My friend,
will you be the Hero of this world?
Oh.
Sorry to bother you then.
And so,
someone else became their hero.
Perfect!
Then letâ€™s get introductions out of the way.
Firstly,
are you a boy or a girl?
Good for you!
And what is your name?
Nice to meet you
Now that I know your name, I'm a Min..
a Min..
looking forward to working with you!
So Hero, I can tell you've had some training, but your PageBook is looking a bit dusty.
Even the greatest heroes can fall out of practice if they spend all thier time wondering aimlessly.
Want a quick reminder on how the Page system works?
Well I hope you know what you're doing,
because there's a pack of Squirrels up there ready to fight.
Good luck, Hero!
I'll start with the basics then.
Imagine you're looking down on the world through a magical window called "the screen".
At the bottom of "the screen" you will see your Pages.
These are your Action Pages.
They represent all the actions you can preform while the Page System is active.
If you want to move,
attack,
cast spells,
use items,
jump, sprint, strafe, fly,
create miracles, lay curses, teleport, shoot guns,

shapeshift, summon minions, levy taxes, teleport, oh wait I said that one, buff allies, cull the weak, consume souls, take drugs, make it rain, turn back time, smell what the rock is cooking, contemplate life, kill god, be sexy, do kung fu fighting, call some lightning, punch ghost, dig a hole, throw bombs, play with fire, commune with spirits, create earthquakes, analyze foes, brew potions, heal the sick, raise the dead, command beast, sing, dance,
... or anything else,
you have to have a Page to do it.
But, how do you uses these Pages?
You put them here in your PageQue.
Before each Round, umm
hold on, I think I have some flash cards for this
Yep, here they are!
Now how about a practical demonstration?
See that mushroom over there?
Let's use it for a little target practice.
We'll start by using the Page System to walk over to it.
Here's another flash card about movement.
Queue up these Pages:
Click the Pages to add them to your PageQue.
Click the PageQue to remove a Page.
Whoops, that's not right.
Let's try again.
No, that's not right either.
I'm sure what every you're trying to do is perfectly valid. But, we've got to follow the script. Just humor me for now and you can do your own thing in a couple Rounds.
No.
Are you having trouble with the inputs? Or are you just checking to see if I have funny things to say?
Because it's not like I have the time to come up with a bunch of responces for someone choosing to fail a tutorial.
There's a whole epic quest to get to, and a world full of people and creatures to see. A bit like this would just be a horrible waste of my time.
So can you please just follow the script and we'll get on with the quest?

You have 6 Action Pages and a PPR of 4. That 1,296 unique permutations for your first Round. It will take at least 2 Rounds to reach the mushroom, so 1,296 squared is 1,679,616 possible paths I'd have to account for.
I have the power to send you back to the Main Menu. This is your last warning.
Fuck it.
Great! Now we'll start the round and see the amazing Page System in action!
Incredible, isn't it?
Now for some violence.
To attack the mushroom, you'll need to move into range.
I've got a flash card for that too.
Queue up these Pages:
Click the Pages to add them to your PageQue.
Click the PageQue to remove a Page.
Time to pick some mushrooms!
The legend of the Mushroom Slayer is born!
Oh, and it looks like the mushroom dropped an Item.
To pick up an Item, just move into the same spot and it will be added to your Bag, if you have room.
When the Page System deactivates, Items that are left in the area will automatically be added to your Inventory (if you're still alive). So don't worry if you miss something.
Now, see the Mushroom on the Roof?
You won't be able to reach it with a melee attack, so let's learn about Missile Pages by throwing a rock at it.
A "Missile" just means any projectile that is created by a Page.
This includes arrows, fireballs, rocks, stuff like that.
I'm replacing your Basic Weapon Attack with a Chuck-A-Rock Page, but I'm just letting you borrow it! You have to give it back.
But first
FLASH CARD!
Queue up these Pages:
Click the Pages to add them to your PageQue.
Click the PageQue to remove a Page.
Great! Now we'll start the turn and when the Targeting UI comes up, just select the spot with the mushroom in it.
You missed!?
You just had to click on the mushroom!
Well, thanks for wasting my rock I guess,
At least you got the basics of how Missiles work. I'm giving you back your Basic Weapon Attack, but you still owe me a rock.
Now no mushroom can escape your wrath!
You can have your Basic Weapon Attack back, and thank you for keeping good care of my rock.
Your final lesson is by far the most important
Something that you MUST know before going into combat
So, it would be seriously bad if if I was inter-
INTRUDERS!!!
What?!
Nevermind what I was just saying.
We've got Squirrels, and they're ready to fight.
I guess it's time for your first live combat exercise.
Oh, and if you feel bad about beating up cute woodland critters, don't worry.
These squirrels are radical political extremists whos views are the exact opposite of whatever you belive in.
Also, they are trying to kill you.
This is a good chance to talk about
how the Round works when multiple Actors are on the field.
Actors can have a different number of actions per turn. I think I've got a flash-
umm
There's more of them than I though.
That's fine though.
See theses Squirriors?.
Looks like they are wearing heavy Armor, so you'll want to-
a
aaaa
nd they've got some Squirrcerer
great.
Let's do this,
you take the rest of the Flash Cards,
and I'll wait in the safty of this cabin.
You've got this, Hero.
You did it!
That's our Hero for you.
But, don't think the tutorial is over yet!
Since the squirrels seem to be dealt with, let's set up camp here and take a look at your PageBook.
